column5: Flying in from another state? Need a stop-n-go home for your busy schedule? Swing on by! Small modern apt located in Oak Lawn. Downtown/Uptown and Dallas Love Field all within a 10 minute drive ($7 uber or lyft) ! Located near all major freeways (Dallas Tollway, i-35, within mins from 75). Market Center train station just a 10 minute walk. Many bars and clubs just blocks away. Whole Foods, Kroger for grocery shopping. What more can you ask for?
